statements: SELECT * FROM LocalDishes ORDER BY dish_id DESC;
SELECT dish_name, region FROM LocalDishes WHERE region = 'Mediterranean';
SELECT dish_name, main_ingredients FROM LocalDishes WHERE main_ingredients LIKE '%rice%';
SELECT * FROM LocalDishes WHERE cooking_method = 'Grilled' ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT dish_name, region, historical_significance FROM LocalDishes WHERE historical_significance IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dish_name, region, main_ingredients FROM LocalDishes WHERE region = 'Italy' ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LocalDishes WHERE main_ingredients LIKE '%lemon%' AND historical_significance IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dish_name, region, main_ingredients, cooking_method FROM LocalDishes WHERE region IN ('France', 'Spain') AND main_ingredients LIKE '%wine%' ORDER BY region DESC, dish_name ASC;
SELECT dish_id, dish_name, region, historical_significance FROM LocalDishes WHERE region = 'Japan' OR region = 'Korea' OR region = 'China' ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT dish_name, region, cooking_method FROM LocalDishes WHERE cooking_method = 'Grilled' OR cooking_method = 'Fried' ORDER BY region, dish_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, dish_origin FROM local_dishes;
SELECT dish_id, dish_name, dish_description FROM local_dishes WHERE dish_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM local_dishes WHERE dish_ingredients @> ARRAY['tomatoes'];
SELECT method_name, method_duration FROM cooking_methods WHERE method_duration > 30;
SELECT dish_name, dish_ingredients FROM local_dishes ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, dish_description FROM local_dishes WHERE dish_origin='Italian';
SELECT dish_name, dish_origin FROM local_dishes WHERE dish_origin IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_duration FROM cooking_methods WHERE method_duration > 30 AND method_duration < 60 ORDER BY method_duration ASC;
SELECT dish_name, dish_ingredients FROM local_dishes WHERE dish_ingredients @> ARRAY['tomato', 'basil']::STRING[];
SELECT method_name, method_tools FROM cooking_methods WHERE method_tools && ARRAY['pan', 'pot']::STRING[] ORDER BY method_id DESC;
SELECT dish_name, region FROM local_dishes;
SELECT * FROM local_dishes WHERE region = 'Italy';
SELECT dish_name, method_name FROM local_dishes JOIN dish_cooking ON local_dishes.dish_id = dish_cooking.dish_id JOIN cooking_methods ON dish_cooking.method_id = cooking_methods.method_id;
SELECT dish_name, region, historical_significance FROM local_dishes ORDER BY region ASC;

SELECT dish_name, method_name FROM local_dishes LEFT JOIN dish_cooking ON local_dishes.dish_id = dish_cooking.dish_id LEFT JOIN cooking_methods ON dish_cooking.method_id = cooking_methods.method_id WHERE cooking_methods.method_name = 'Grilling';
SELECT * FROM local_dishes ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, region FROM local_dishes WHERE region='Italy';
SELECT dish_name, method_name FROM local_dishes JOIN dish_cooking ON local_dishes.dish_id = dish_cooking.dish_id JOIN cooking_methods ON dish_cooking.method_id = cooking_methods.method_id;
SELECT dish_name, historical_significance FROM local_dishes WHERE historical_significance IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_dishes, region FROM local_dishes GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT dish_name, region, ingredients FROM local_dishes ORDER BY region, dish_name DESC;
SELECT method_name, description FROM cooking_methods WHERE method_name = 'Grilling';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients, cooking_method FROM local_dishes WHERE region = 'Italian';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM dish_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT dish_name, region, ingredients, cooking_method FROM local_dishes WHERE region = 'Mexican' AND ingredients LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT dish_name, region, ingredients FROM local_dishes WHERE region='Italy';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients, cooking_method FROM local_dishes ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM dish_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 AND review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients, cooking_method, description FROM local_dishes JOIN cooking_methods ON local_dishes.cooking_method = cooking_methods.method_name;
SELECT dish_name, region, historical_date FROM local_dishes JOIN dish_history ON local_dishes.dish_id = dish_history.dish_id WHERE historical_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT dish_name, region, origin_year FROM LocalDishes;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE category = 'Spices';
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT chef_name, region_specialty, experience_years FROM Chefs WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT dish_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Ratings GROUP BY dish_name;
SELECT dish_name, region FROM LocalDishes WHERE origin_year > 1800 ORDER BY region ASC
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT chef_name, region_specialty, experience_years FROM Chefs WHERE experience_years >= 5 AND region_specialty IS NOT NULL ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, origin FROM Ingredients WHERE category = 'Spices' OR category = 'Herbs'
SELECT dish_name, region, origin_year FROM LocalDishes WHERE region = 'Italian' OR region = 'French' ORDER BY origin_year DESC
